trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving"></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved"></xref> events.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> event occurs when the user is moving the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> event occurs when the user finishes moving the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs> class specifies the position of the mouse pointer and the position of the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.

Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified coordinates of the mouse pointer and the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> control.
The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).
The y-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).
The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> (in client coordinates).
The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> (in client coordinates).
Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> (in client coordinates).

You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitY%2A> property of this class to determine the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the control.
Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> (in client coordinates).

You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitX%2A> property of this class to determine the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the control.
Gets the x-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).

You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.Y%2A> property of this class to determine the current location of the mouse pointer when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer.
Gets the y-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).

You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.X%2A> property of this class to determine the current location of the mouse pointer when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
The y-coordinate of the mouse pointer.
